General.Name: China Spacesat Co Ltd
General.Description: China Spacesat Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of satellites and related products. It is also involved in research and development, design, manufacture, sale, and information servicing of aerospace technology applications and related products. The company's satellite products also include optical remote sensing, electromagnetic and microwave remote sensing, and science and technology experiments, etc. Its products and services are used in the fields of communications, satellite navigation, satellite remote sensing, and other fields. The company is based in Beijing, China. China Spacesat Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of China Aerospace Science and Technology Corporation.
General.Address: Shenzhou Science and Technology Building, Beijing, China, 100081

1.Name: Ms. Yinjuan  Wan
